content: I am searching for an old school friend, Christopher Newman Ferguson, graduated from Walker High School, Jasper, Alabama, in 1982. Lost touch, but knew he went into the Navy and has become a lifer. Wanted to touch base with him again. I also want to thank all of you for your service to our country and have great respect for all of you. If you know him, please have him contact me at email address is deleted, personal contact information is not allowed. kimberley Ann Bell Peck This message has been edited. Last edited by: OldArmyLove, Tue 12 May 2009 02:08 PM

title: Hello to all you Navy people.

content: Hi thelakelife, I'm a Navy vet. Post your request on the Navy forum! BTW, not a good idea to post your personal e-mail. You never know who is on here. Delete you personal e-mail addr. You should be able to communicate through your PM, it should be in your profile! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: quote: Originally posted by Bergy46: If you put 30 years in the Navy, they give you an Aircraft Carrier as a retirement gift! Hey Bergy good to see you on here . I spent 20 years in the Navy Seabee's and the gave me a Bull Dozer but I had to leave it cuz they wouldn't let me drive it on the interstate..... SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA
